name: Hanzi of the Day
author: Feihong Hsu

sections.description:
This plugin gives you a widget that displays a different Chinese character every day. The characters are randomly plucked from a list that includes all the commonly-used characters plus a few somewhat rare characters.

Uninstallation

  1. Delete the hanzi-of-the-day folder from your site’s wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Delete the ($table_prefix)hanzi_of_the_day_ordinals table from your database.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the hanzi-of-the-day folder to your site’s wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Activate the plugin in the WordPress Admin Panel. Note that this may take a while since it needs to create a new database and load 3000 rows into it.
  4. Add the widget in your Widget Area
  5. Enjoy learning a new Chinese character every day!
sections.faq: There are currently no FAQs at this time.

short_description: A widget that displays a different Chinese character every day.
